Adults substance abuse psychiatric comorbidity randomly assign either two variant auricular acupuncture - The National Acupuncture Detoxification Association protocol ( NADA ) local protocol ( LP ) - relaxation training ( control ) . Primary outcome measure use Beck Anxiety Inventory ( BAI ) Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) assessment treatment follow-ups five week three month .
